content:
Thank you so much for your kind words and offer! I'm thrilled to have had the opportunity to chat with you about Agatha Christie and The Mousetrap. Your passion for theater and musical theater is inspiring, and I'm grateful for the chance to learn from you.

I must say, I've learned a great deal from our conversation, and I appreciate the recommendations you've shared. I'll definitely be checking out some of the books and documentaries you mentioned to deepen my understanding of Agatha Christie's life and work.

If I do have any more questions or need further recommendations, I won't hesitate to reach out. Thank you again for your time and expertise. It's been an absolute pleasure chatting with you!

Break a leg with your audition, and I hope you get the role in The Mousetrap!
